extendedIngredients.name: steak seasoning
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 16oz. bottle of Dale's steak seasoning (Its a liquid marinade)

recipes.title: The Best Pot Roast EVER (Crock Pot)
recipes.instructions: Heat your crock pot up to medium or high. If you want this is 4-5 hours, heat it up to high, or let it cook for 8-9 hours all day on the low setting.Open your two cans of cream of mushroom soup and place them into the crock pot.Add your 1 cup of waterplace your pot roast into the crock potpour  cup of Dales seasoning over the pot roast and cover.when halfway thru your cooking time, turn your pot roast over and pour an additional half a cup of Dales seasoning over it.Pull and serve when done.

steps.step: Heat your crock pot up to medium or high. If you want this is 4-5 hours, heat it up to high, or let it cook for 8-9 hours all day on the low setting.Open your two cans of cream of mushroom soup and place them into the crock pot.

Add your 1 cup of waterplace your pot roast into the crock potpour  cup of Dales seasoning over the pot roast and cover.when halfway thru your cooking time, turn your pot roast over and pour an additional half a cup of Dales seasoning over it.Pull and serve when done.
